update nonbis_city_code
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_FULL_NAME = #{cityFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select CITY_ID,CITY_CODE,CITY_NAME,CITY_FULL_NAME,CITY_FULL_CODE,LEVEL_NUMBER,CHILD_SIZE,OPEN_TIME,OPEN_STUTAS,CLOSE_TIME from nonbis_city_code where LEVEL_NUMBER in (1,2)
